description.content: In the first garage/storage room on the left on Silent Street, where the Creepers crash out of the wall.
After going through the gate, climb up to the right and follow that path to the end for this collectible.
Southeast from where you are, follow the alleyway to the end and there'll be a robot there to destroy for loot.
In the water after passing through the gate.
Back on Silent Street, down there on the left, near to where you just went swimming
To the left of the bridge in a garage, before going across, where you fight your first Cricket Slasher - hit the car and loot the for the Micro Drive.
To the left, when you're halfway across the bridge. Jump over the gap to reach the rooftops and follow to the back.
To the left of the bridge, drop down, kill the two Cricket Slashers and then the Hydra and open the box to the north. Inside is an Omnibolt, the Combo Attack Enhancement Gear (+14%).
To the right after the bridge, near where the Scan tutorial. Climb up near the scaffolding on the right hand side of the road to the top.

After the ambush with the Mutated Creeper, Creepers and finally the Heavy Guardian, head down the alley to the north-northeast corner and follow it round to the left. There, near a Guardian, is the Beta Core (needed to upgrade your max beta energy).
Where the ambush took place, head up to the top of the building in the southeast, using the yellow ledges on the southeast wall.

title: Memorystick - The Last Words of the Hopeless / Passcode - B0ak0r

description.content: Head the correct way after the ambush, and as you get onto the balcony, and before you grab onto the poles, there's a corpse on your left with this passcode and memorystick.

images.url: /assets/images/Eidos7/Silent-Street/12-Memorystick & Passcode (The Last Words of the Hopeless) - B0ak0r.jpg
images.alt: Memorystick - The Last Words of the Hopeless / Passcode - B0ak0r

description.content: In the caged off area in the water section with the ladder. There's a hole in the fence you can use to get in.
In the same area as the water and the ladder, climb up the yellow ledges on the northwest wall of the building at the far end. There's a human corpse on the roof.
Up the ladder from the water will be a camp straight ahead.
From the camp, head down the ladder and go west to Barker Drugs. The chest is in there.
On a corpse in the back of the same room as the locked chest
After heading through the door (using the Fusion Cell), head left, defeat the Barnacle, and this document is a book on the shelf in the southeast corner.
In the Parking Tower, underneath the first set of stairs up.
Up the set of stairs into the parking garage.
In the southwest corner of the Parking Tower roof.
Down the southeast ramp from the roof is a corpse with this memorystick.
In the southwest corner of the parking lot third floor (opposite the previous memorystick, in the corner).
In the northeast corner of the second floor inside the Parking Tower.
Opposite the exit of the parking garage, the camera will focus on it as you exit.

From the camp, head right to the corner of the building on your right. Climb up the yellow crate and shimmy around to the roof. Kill the Guardian, climb up again, kill the Cricket Slasher. In there is a Legion Supply Drop.
In the same room, on the wall.
Head north of the camp, and then head east at the end. In a building called Otenb Pomakc is a blue box where you'd usually find a newspaper. It's basically underneath the room you just climbed to.
Opposite the previous collectible, near a statue, you'll find another human corpse with a memorystick.

Head north from the previous two collectibles (towards Gate 6) and then head down the stairs to an underground area, before heading up the stairs straight ahead. At the far end of that area (north), near two explosive barrells and a Cosnia Kolzen sign is another human and another Body Core.
Head southwest out of the Parking Tower and follow the alley around, on the corner is a small bar/pub with lights on inside. The Body Core is on a body inside the shop.
South of the parking lot, near the previous body core is a locked chest. Contains Omnibolt & Fixed Damage Gear.
In the same area as the previous collectibles. To the north by the fence/gate is a treasure/relic lootbot.

From the camp, head left and head east this time. Next to the two enemies who ambush you past the bus, use the yellow box on the left to climb the wall and drop into the alley nearby. The human corpse and memorystick is at the west side of the alley.
North of gate 12, which is east and then north from the camp, is a Dozer and a car with a fusion core, this box is right next to the car.
East and then north from the camp (also north of gate 1), on the eastern wall, under cover, is a body with this memorystick.
Head slightly north of the corpse and turn around and climb the side of the building. There's a supply crate up top.

title: Memorystick - Respite of the Hopeful / Passcode - oBukoB

description.content: After entering the flooded facility, to the right of the first door (north wall) is a corpse underwater with both this memorystick and passcode.

images.alt: Memorystick - Respite of the Hopeful / Passcode - oBukoB

description.content: Up the elevator shaft in the Abandoned Station.
As you get out of the monorail on the other side.

title: Nano Suit - Planet Diving Suit (7th) V2

description.content: In the southwest corner, in a small room, in the tram station at the beginning of the level (before heading outside towards the objective).

images.alt: Nano Suit - Planet Diving Suit (7th) V2

description.content: At the base of the stairs leading out of the monorail station.
Head north from the bottom of the monorail stairs (away from the objective), and there's a corpse there on the left with this memory stick.
Further north, near the northernmost chainlink fence is a corpse with this Beta Core.

Northeast of the monorail station, over the river, head into the far northeast corner. Drop down onto the ledges and shimmy to the east. You'll reach a plaza with a Mutated Hydra. In the east corner is Caliente, a store with this supply box.
On the northern side of the plaza is a walkway. At the end is a crate with this Exospine in it.

Head back across the ledges you used to get to this plaza and continue south. Climb up the yellow grabbable ledges and there'll be a group of stone monsters (1 real) by this corpse, underneath the Barker Drugs sign.
After using the passcode to unlock the 317 gate, head through and the supply camp is straight ahead.
East of the plaza entryway camp, by an enemy ambush of sorts. Hard to miss this one.
Further east from the supply box, to the right of the ladder.
In the next area, having dropped down after climbing up, in the north corner there's a pool with lily pads. The corpse is in the water.
After using the clock to open the Club Bpemr door (1225), there's a corpse straight ahead, near a teapot and a small camp.
After climbing the ladder and dropping down, there's a camp to the west.
To the northeast of the camp, up the stairs, there's a corpse there near a statue.

Before heading up and over the bridge to the otherside of the abyss, from the camp head west and down. Use the poles to cross the gap and you'll come to an area with a Barnacle. Defeat it, and in a small enclosure to the southwest is this skin).
In the same area as the drone skin, on the northside, is a corpse with this beta core.
Northwest of where you enter the plaza, down a metal walkway, and into an alleyway. The box is there.
South of the pillar (that leads to the Hall of Records) you see when you get into the area is a corpse.
To the east of the pillar in the plaza is another corpse.
On the south side of the area where you fought the Corrupter is a corpse with this memorystick.

In Northeast corner of the Corrupter battle area there's an alleyway. Head down it slightly (just down the stairs), and to the right is a corpse with this Beta Core on it. Inside The Red Grill (with flashing neon 'closed' sign).
In the northeast corner of the upstairs area is a Legion Supply Box.
At the end of the road (don't go up the ladder yet) is a relic robot. Destroy it to get the Tumbler Expansion Module.
Up the ladder and to the north is the next camp.
Just to the north of the camp is a corpse with this memorystick.

Need Drone Hacking Tool to unlock - After dropping into the construction zone (off the road), the chest is behind you, to the east, near a large truck and some shipping containers. We'll include this later when you can return to the area and get the rest of the collectibles.
Southwest of where you drop in, on the ground level, underneath a half-finished floor, is this corpse.
Follow the corridor round on the ground, all the way to the southwest. There you'll find this case with some supplies, an Omnibolt, and the Beta Enhancement Gear.
In the centre of the Construction Zone area. On the same level as the area you drop in at. Above the two previous collectibles (in-between them).
In the northwest building, in the corner near the generator.
In the northwest corner (to the right of the elevator and up the shipping crates). Pretty much above the Locked Supply Chest.
Turn on the generator to power the elevator, and go up the lift. At the top, jump to the north for this supply box.
Beneath where the lift takes you to in the northwest corner. When going for the previous supply box, on your way back you'll end up in this room where the corpse is.
In the northern area of the Construction Zone (after passing a statue), there's a corpse there, inside the building.

Head out the window to the south from the crate with the crane ID card, and look to the southwest. Run and jump onto that rope and swing to the platforms over the other side. Then, jump onto the scaffolding to the southwest. The supply crate is a level down from the top of said scaffolding.
South of the supply camp in the middle of the Construction Zone is this robot with a Tumbler Expansion Module.
In the east-southeast corner (near another lift), climb the wrecked building to the top, and you'll find a can on the table there.

Use the crane to position the large steel beam to the east (near the digger). Then, use it to jump up to the two openings in the wall. The left one leads to a floor with a corpse to get this transmission from.
Get back on the beam and jump into the other building. The Body Core is on the floor there.
Turn around and use the yellow ledges to climb up to the next floor. The earrings are in the back of the room.
Use the crane to destroy the wall to the left of the exit out of the Construction Zone, then head round to grab it before moving on.
Use the crane to destroy the right wall this time, and use the beam to get across into that room. This Nano Suit is inside.
After crossing over the steel beam, this camp is through the door on the left.
At the first crossroads, there's a chest you can't miss on the corner at the intersection.
Follow the southern corridor to the end, and before going outside there's a human corpse on the right at the end.
Head outside from the previous human corpse and you'll find another human with a Body Core.
Head down the west tunnel now, but before you head right at the end, take the northern tunnel down to the end. At the end is a robot with this relic.
In the same area, head into the water behind the robot and you'll find another human corpse.
After the tunnel collapses a bit, and you have to jump down onto the pipe, at the top look left. There's another human corpse there.
After climbing up to the top (after the pipe section), instead of going north and down the hole, head northeast and down that hole. There's a human dead body there with this core on it.
After getting back on course from the previous collectible and dropping down the hole, there's a human corpse as you drop with this memorystick on it.

Use the pole to get across the gap and take the rope down. There's a human corpse down there (with no memorystick). However, behind said corpse is this supply box. There's also another corpse (only XP) down there too.
Take the rope back up, go left down the tunnel and then right to find this camp.
Follow the corridor directly ahead of the camp to the end and head right. There's a human corpse at the end. Also includes the Floodgate Key.
There's a box just behind the aforementioned corpse. Includes an Omnbolt and Speed Increase Gear.
When Adam says the exit is to the right (after opening the second floodgate), down that corridor to the right is this bot and this relic.
By a rock as soon as you enter the Crater area (near the small bit of water).
Just to the right, up the rocks, when you enter the Crater area. Hard to miss.
In Bar 99 on Silent Street, you can now open this cache if you picked up the “Legion's Secret Stash” Request. Code is 1228.

title: Document - Books - The Words of the Devout Felix

description.content: As part of “The Words of the Mother Sphere” side quest (from Francis, at the book shop in Xion). In the library near Silent Street.

images.url: /assets/images/Eidos7/9-Eidos7Continued/2-Document - Books - The Words of the Devout Felix.1.jpg
images.alt: Document - Books - The Words of the Devout Felix

images.url: /assets/images/Eidos7/9-Eidos7Continued/2-Document - Books - The Words of the Devout Felix.2.jpg
images.alt: Document - Books - The Words of the Devout Felix

description.content: Head back to the Hall of Records, and interact with the plinth in the plaza, as part of the “Taboo” side quest.
Return to where you fought the Gigas when you have the “Generous Drop Pod” Request.
In the northwest corner of the Flooded Commercial Sector, if you drop down to the near where you lifted the floodgates.
Take the ramp down into the proper main area of the commercial sector. There's a supply box in the northwest corner.
In the path to the east of the Wayfield Diner (pretty much underneath it) is a robot with the passcode needed for the next chest.
In the southwest corner, on one of the balconies, inside the Wayfield Diner (pretty much above the previous robot).
Head north from where you found the robot and inside The Red Grill (with a flashing neon red closed sign) is this can.
Head down a level by the nearby rope (south of the can) and in the southwest corner is this Nano Suit design.
Follow the path around to the northwest and climb the ramps to the top. There's a supply chest up there.
Head back down and follow the path around to the southeast. After passing the liquor store, you'll come across a Fizz machine on the left.
As part of the Oblivion side quest, you'll head to Warehouse 77, where you'll find this inside along with the next 5 collectibles.
Inside Warehouse 77, at the bottom of the ladder.

title: Document - Series - Book of Faith and Wisdom 2:3-6

description.content: Inside Warehouse 77, also at the bottom of the ladder.

images.alt: Document - Series - Book of Faith and Wisdom 2:3-6

description.content: Inside Warehouse 77, also at the bottom of the ladder.
Inside Warehouse 77, also at the bottom of the ladder.
Inside Warehouse 77, on the small section above the other bodies.

Part of the “End of the Nightmare” side quest in the previously flooded Commercial District (have to lift the floodgates, fast-travel to a different place, and then return to Eidos 7 for this one to appear).  North side of the river, at the lowest level you can go
Directly behind you at the beginning of the level, between Adam's tetrapod and Lily's workshop. Can't be missed, as it's the main base of operations and you'll be visiting it frequently.
East of the tetrapod, just drop down a level to get it. Includes 2 Omnibolts and Ranged Protection Gear.
Outside the Presence Chamber (following Adam, as part of the story).
After coming out of the Presence Chamber (and a load of cutscenes), head to the left-hand corner of the room you enter into.
After Adam and Lily part ways with you, head to the cafe on the right and go behind the counter. Contains 2 x Omnibolt and Risk Taking Gear.
A few steps left of the waypoint near where Adam and Lily parted ways with you outside of the Presence Chamber.
Just to the right of the waypoint.

title: Document -  Promotions (Funding Announcements: Colony Bound Rocket)

description.content: From the waypoint, turn 180 degrees and run forward. On a metal shutter, to the right of a blue work desk.

images.alt: Document - Promotions (Funding Announcements: Colony Bound Rocket)
Document - Promotions (Funding Announcements: Colony Bound Rocket)

description.content: Head down the stairs next to the last collectible, until you hit Gwen Hair Salon. Then take a left down the stairs. The collectible is on a barrel down that corridor (that has a dead-end with a red banner).
Do a 180 from the last collectible, and up high on the other side of the street/alleyway, is a Fiz machine. Interact and it'll drop this can.
Leave the alleyway and head towards Sisters' Junk. When you see the Liquor neon sign, there's a collectible to the left of it, near a doorway (down a few steps).
Do another 180 and head towards the vending machines behind you. To its left is a blue newspaper box. Interact with it. It's opposite the stairs up to Sisters' Junk.

title: Document - Promotions (For You Dimwits Still Believing In Mother Sphere)

description.content: After heading up the stairs to Sisters' Junk, take a left and there's another poster there, in the corner near the fence.

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/13-Document-Promotions-For You Dimwits Still Believing In Mother Sphere.1.jpg
images.alt: Document - Promotions (For You Dimwits Still Believing In Mother Sphere)

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/13-Document-Promotions-For You Dimwits Still Believing In Mother Sphere.2.jpg
images.alt: Document - Promotions (For You Dimwits Still Believing In Mother Sphere)

description.content: Before going down the stairs to Sisters' Junk, head up the stairs to the right of them. The poster is on a metal shutter up the stairs to the right.
Carry on along the balcony above Sisters' Junk until you hit a doorway with some stairs up on the right. There's a chest at the top of the stairs. Beat the directional passcode mini game to open it.
From the previous chest, go down the stairs and head right. The poster is on a metal shutter to the right.
To the left of the previous poster (above Sisters' Junk), is another Fiz machine where you can get this can.
To the left of Sisters' Junk is this book.

title: Document - Promotions (Xion Freedom Liberation Alliance Flyer)

description.content: Down the stairs from Sisters' Junk, take a right (south) until you reach a steam grate on the floor, and then head left. The poster is on a metal shutter in the thin alleyway.

images.alt: Document - Promotions (Xion Freedom Liberation Alliance Flyer)
Document - Promotions (Xion Freedom Liberation Alliance Flyer)

description.content: Between the waypoint and the bulletin board is an alleyway with this can at the end of it.
180 from the previous can, head back up the alley and head to the right. At the top of the hill take the stairs and there's another can in front of you.
Right next to the Bulletin Board.
On the bench opposite Roxanne and the Bulletin Board.

items: Document - Information: Personal Link with Orcal
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Planet Diving Suit (2nd)
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Orca Exploration Suit
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Keyhole Dress
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Cybernetic Dress
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Moutan Peony

title: Available to purchase from Roxanne after restoring the second Hyper Cell:

description.content: In an alleyway that leads to The Last Gulp (where Su and Enya are) there's a Fiz machine on the left as you start to head down the alleyway.
On the wall by the body for the Missing Husband Request, near The Last Gulp.
On the ground directly to the left of the Angel Is A Lie poster.
By the fence at the end of the same alley as the previous document and memorystick.
At the far end of the northern plaza with the large planet sculpture in the centre, in the far right hand corner (to the right of Delloih), up some stairs, there is a Fiz machine.
Just to the left of the Fiz machine is this document.
To the left of the Delloih place, outside a window display with mannequins and near a skateboard.
In a metal crate in the far north of the map (to the left of Delloih, opposite the cafe near the entrance to Presence Chamber).

If you look forward from the cafe, with it behind you, cross the plaza to the other side until you see Delloih. Take the stairs to the left of it and around that building is a locked chest. The passcode from the robot unlocks this crate.
Visit the console in The Cradle, underneath Xion after accepting the Sleeping Beauty Request and you'll get this document.
On the roof next to the bizarre shop with the statue inside, near the entrance/exit to Xion.

title: Document - Series (Book of Faith and Wisdom 2:1-4), Series (The Lost 72 Years 3) & Book (How to Speak with Style)

description.content: In the alleyway to the right of the exit (as if you're leaving Xion to head back to the ship), at the end of said alleyway is a book store. You'll find these books on the shelves.

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/36-Document-Series-Book of Faith and Wisdom 2 1-4, Series-The Lost 72 Years 3 & Book-How to Speak with Style.1.jpg
images.alt: Document - Series (Book of Faith and Wisdom 2:1-4)

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/36-Document-Series-Book of Faith and Wisdom 2 1-4, Series-The Lost 72 Years 3 & Book-How to Speak with Style.2.jpg
images.alt: Document - Series (Book of Faith and Wisdom 2:1-4)

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/36-Document-Series-Book of Faith and Wisdom 2 1-4, Series-The Lost 72 Years 3 & Book-How to Speak with Style.3.jpg
images.alt: Document - Series (Book of Faith and Wisdom 2:1-4)

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/36-Document-Series-Book of Faith and Wisdom 2 1-4, Series-The Lost 72 Years 3 & Book-How to Speak with Style.4.jpg
/assets/images/Xion/1-Xion/36-Document-Series-Book of Faith and Wisdom 2 1-4, Series-The Lost 72 Years 3 & Book-How to Speak with Style.5.jpg

description.content: On your way back to the safehouse, on the final bridge, before you start to cross it. On the side on the right.
Where the 3 bridges converge in Xion is a rope. Go down the rope, down the ladder, and follow the platforms to the end.
There's also a can on the rock behind the supply box. Jump over to pick it up.
Submerged in the small pond by the exit to the Wasteland. If you picked up the Lost Device request from the Bulletin Board, just follow the quest marker.
In the Gwen Hair Salon (which opens up after you agree to go to the Wasteland on foot), which is in the centre of Xion, near the stairs that leads to Sisters' Junk.
Speak to the young girl to the south of the entrance to Xion (down the ladder). She'll give you this document, which will start the “Oblivion” side quest.

items: Document - Book - Light of the Colony
Document - Book - Angel Accepting Shed Tears
Document - Book - For a Better World
Document - Series - Notes on EVE Protocol 2
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Daily Biker
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Black Full Dress
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Junk Mechanic
Nano Suit Design Pattern: Daily Denim

images.alt: Document - Book - Light of the Colony
Document - Series - Notes on EVE Protocol 2

description.content: Next to Sisters' Junk is a chest that can be opened once you've found Tommy in the “Life of the Scavengers” side quest.

title: Legion Supply Box / Document - Journal - Aaron's Journal

description.content: Return to the area where the “Angel of Death” side quest ambush took place and you can enter the garage now with the aSaSaS code (which can be found in the Junkyard in the Wasteland).

images.alt: Legion Supply Box / Document - Journal - Aaron's Journal
Legion Supply Box / Document - Journal - Aaron's Journal
Legion Supply Box / Document - Journal - Aaron's Journal
Legion Supply Box / Document - Journal - Aaron's Journal

description.content: West of Gwen Hair Salon is a locked door. Use the passcode naEdrr to open it, which you get from the Great Desert, to the south-southeast of the Solar Tower in the south.

Just south of the Gwen Hair Salon, at some point, you'll find a document, which will start the side quest “A United People Cannot be Defended.” Didn't show up until we returned from a prolonged stint in the Great Desert.
Opposite the southernmost Waypoint in Xion (triggered by some completion of a side quest, we imagine).

title: Document - Promotions - Introducing the Ark-Tech's Ark!

description.content: Speak to Mann after returning from Altess Levoire to start the “Lost Ark side” mission. Follow the waypoint to the northeast of Xion, and you will come across the body of the radical.

images.alt: Document - Promotions - Introducing the Ark-Tech's Ark!
Document - Promotions - Introducing the Ark-Tech's Ark!

description.content: After investigating the body, head over to the second location that has just been marked on your map. Check at the device next to the entrance of the Ark for this document.
Once inside, you have to investigate four bodies in order to determine what happened inside of the Ark. The first one is right at the door.

title: Memorystick - Monolog of a Trapped Man

description.content: The second body is in a small room on the left side, kneeling by a chair.

images.alt: Memorystick - Monolog of a Trapped Man
Memorystick - Monolog of a Trapped Man

description.content: The next body is in the big room on the right side, by a large pile of bodies.
The last body is in the same room as the previous one, turn around and you'll see it against the wall by one of the doors.

title: Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Delivers Its Best Service By Protecting Its Customers!

description.content: Check the large monitor inside the same room, it's just up the steps from the pile of bodies.

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/2-XionContinued/14-Document - Promotions (Ark-Tech Delivers Its Best Service By Protecting Its Customers!).1.jpg
images.alt: Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Delivers Its Best Service By Protecting Its Customers!

images.url: /assets/images/Xion/2-XionContinued/14-Document - Promotions (Ark-Tech Delivers Its Best Service By Protecting Its Customers!).2.jpg
images.alt: Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Delivers Its Best Service By Protecting Its Customers!

description.content: As soon as you enter the area. However, you need to restore power at the Solar Tower to use it (side quest, “Reboot”).
From the supply camp, head southwest and there'll be a human corpse as the area opens up a little
The corpse next to the previous memorystick is actually part of the “Missing Wife” Request. Interact to get this memorystick.
Just slightly southwest from the previous memorysticks.
East of the supply camp is a robot who drops this document.
Southeast of the Hidden Path supply camp is a large dead tree with a human corpse at its base.
East of the previous memorystick.
Just slightly southeast of the waypoint, behind a massive steel girder.
Not far south from the Waypoint (northeast of the Barren Land Legion Camp).
Southwest of the previous supply box is the Barren Land Legion Camp.
Just northwest of the Barren Land Legion Camp is a Hedgeboar by two corpses.
The other corpse is next to the previous Memorystick.
Slumped up against the west side of the Solar Tower.
At the top of the Solar Tower, in the western area of the Wasteland.
West of the Solar Tower is a body, at the base of a billboard.

Turn on 2 consoles in the area north of the Solar Tower, then push the yellow box to the shipping container in the middle of the area to turn on the final console. The chest next to it will open, which has this can inside.
Head northeast of the Solar Tower and climb the cliffs up to the large open area to the northwest. There's a corpse at the entrance.
North of the previous memorystick, in the haven. Underwater. Ignore the other chest for now (the locked one), as that's part of another quest later on when you have the Fishing Rod.
Head back out from the haven, go east and drop down onto the rocks for this Nano Suit.
You'll find this camp east of the Solar Tower.
Just to the northeast of the Supply Camp is a human corpse with this memorystick.
Southeast of the Barren Land Legion Camp is a robot with a Mind Map Copy inside. Part of Su and Enya's side quest, “Looking At You.”
East of the Hidden Path Supply Camp is a path that leads to a dead end. It's heavily guarded, and has a robot in the middle. Part of Su and Enya's side quest, “Looking At You.”
Defeat the three waves of enemies in the small arena to the north of the Robot and you'll find this in the case at the end.
South of the previous area. On the cliffs to the west.
East of the previous memorystick. At the end of a small dead end.
South of the previous supply crate, just jump down the cliff and it's by an enemy or two.
South of the previous memorystick, in the southeast corner of the dead end area.
On the eastern path from the previous items (the path that leads to Altess Levoire)
Head south from the Barren Land Legion Camp into the Great Canyon. Straight ahead is a corpse by a car (and a few Hedgeboars).
Just slightly south of the aforementioned memorystick.
Head west from the two previous collectibles, and there'll be a human corpse in the next passageway.
Continue west from the previous memorystick and there'll be two Hedgeboars. Next to it is this human corpse and memorystick.
Next to the previous memorystick.
Southwest of the corridor you came into the area, up the hill, is opposite the abandoned ship, is this locked supply crate. Opens with the d-pad mini-game.
South of the previous locked chest is a Legion Supply box with 2 Omnibolts and Combat Supply Gear.
Inside the ship (the south side) there's a corpse inside, inside a shipping container.
Inside the shipping container next to the memorystick one (still inside the ship). You get into it via the same shipping container.
Behind the ship (west side). Head out via a hole in the wall near the last two collectibles and then head south.
Northeast of the ship is a load of old abandoned cars. This box in the middle of them. Inside is 2 x Omnibolts and Training Gear
In the northwest corner of the large ship, you'll find this robot (south of the Solar Tower region).
East of the ship to the south-southeast of the Solar Tower Entrance is a chest that needs 2 spheres to open. The one is next to it. The other is to the southwest. There is a can inside.
Southwest of the previous box is a Legion Supply Box.
East of the large ship (and south-southeast of the Solar Tower Entrance Supply Camp) is this Supply Camp.

title: Document - Prayers - Chapter of Trial 5 - d

description.content: East of the supply camp, in the closest cliffface is a small cave with a shrine in it.

images.alt: Documents Prayers - Chapter of Trial 5 - d
Documents Prayers - Chapter of Trial 5 - d

description.content: Southeast of the Western Great Canyon Supply Camp (in the middle of some red plants - watch out for the Tentacles).
East of the previous Supply Camp is this Legion Camp.
A little further southeast of the Legion Camp is this Supply Box.
Next to the previous Supply Box.
Northwest of the Central Great Canyon Legion Camp is a corpse with this memorystick.
Northeast from the Central Great Canyon Legion Camp is a small nook in the cliff face. Inside you'll find two human corpses, one with this memorystick.
Next to the previous memorystick.
East of the two previous collectibles, on a thin path that heads east.
Carry on east past the robot until you hit a dead-end, where you'll find this memorystick.
West of the small nook where you found the Body Core and Memorystick.
Head northwest from the previous box to get to this box (in a dead end near 2 Hedgeboars).

Head south from the previous supply box to a large crate. Opening it will free a flying dartboard. Shoot it and follow it south. Shoot it again, and again, follow it south and then east. Shoot it to get it to drop the can.
As soon as you enter the Scrap Plains from the Barren Lands.
Southeast of the supply camp is a small yellow droid. Interact with it to unlock this log.
Further southeast of the previous document. Inside a shipping container near the edge of the cliff.
South of the previous Supply Box, in a small area that you can get to by heading west from the previous supply box. Shoot the barrels to free the box from tar. Need the Hacking Tool to unlock.
Head east from the last lot of collectibles to the building by the scrap piles. In the middle of the scrap piles is a human corpse with this Beta Core.
On the front of the building east of the previous collectible. Near the ladder.
Northeast of the previous shack is a literal bus stop which doubles up as a camp.
East of the Bus Stop, in a container. Contains Ranged Enhancement Gear and 1 Omnibolt.
Southeast of the bus stop are some ruins with a robot inside.
South-southeast of the bus stop, all the way down to the end of the level is a broken highway. Get on the highway and the robot is to the far south (watch out for the turret though).
Go up and to the east from the Waypoint, climbing towards the top. On the way you'll pass a crate.
Keep climbing to the top (above the Waypoint), and there's a body with a Beta Core on the edge.
Now head northeast from up top and out the back of the collapsed buildings. Contains 5x Drone Upgrade Modules.
Back west of the bus stop (northeast of the Central Scrap Plains).
Northwest of the Central Scrap Plains Supply Camp, under a small shelter by the cliff face.
Southwest of the Waypoint, up the slope, near a large generator.
As you keep heading up past the two turrets from below, look southwest and there'll be a robot there.
Right behind the robot.

You need to destroy all the red drones working on the towers (and turn the power on down the button) in the same area as the other two. Once done, the door will open on the shack at the top of the hill. Contains 2 WB Pumps.

Northwest of the Waypoint is a yellow structure. The crate is up high. Head to the north of that dead end from where you are. At the top is a level that drops one of the platforms on a timer. Pull the lever, race back, avoid the two turrets, and the chest is all yours.
North of the Waypoint, jump on the yellow bus and onto the back of the monorail. Contains 4x Bionic Field Generators.
Drop down, and slightly north of the monorail cabin is a dead human.
This is part of the “Urgent Information” side quest.
This is part of the “Urgent Information” side quest.
This is part of the “Urgent Information” side quest.
Right at the northside of the oil storage facility, inside a shipping container.
Follow the path down from the northeast and you'll come to a small robot town (Scrap Yard), as well as this Supply Camp.
in the northeast corner of the Scrap Yard, but even with a yellow box, the ladder appears not to have collision detection. Come back when you have the Double Jump if you can't get it.
There's another one in the south corner of the area. Climb up and jump over a fence to reach the back wall.
Leave D1G-g2r's Scrap Yard and head southeast. Unlock the gate (to open the shortcut) and then unlock the Locked Chest (with the d-pad mini-game).
Carry on south up the hill from the Corrupter Boss Fight.
Next to the human body where the memorystick came from is a small box where this Nano Suit can be found.

Southwest of the waypoint is a decently sized encampment. Clear the enemies, and then use the batteries on the pressure plates to open the gates. First, the one on the left to free the orange box. Second on the right to free the second battery. Then, put both of the batteries on the plates to open the door. Push the orange box southwest, and use it to get on top of the place where you freed the trapped battery. Has an Omnibolt and Gold Gear inside of it.

Drop down, push the orange box through the main gate and onto the big platform. Then jump up and climb the rope, interact with the chest, and shoot all the targets except the red ones before they disappear. Do that and this nano suit is all yours.
Follow the path west from the waypoint, the memorystick is between the ruined building and the rocky hill.
Pull a 180 from the memorystick, and the Fiz machine is straight ahead.
Continue on the path west from the Fiz machine until you come to a small open-area, on the north side, next to a vending machine, is a blue newspaper dispensary. Interact to get this document.
Opposite the previous collectible, behind the ruins to the south.
When you get through the wallrunning tutorial as you head south, there'll be a camp on the left.
Just nearby the previous one, head to the northern edge and shoot the 3 girders where the drone is. Doing that will cause the drone to fly upwards and dig up a can for you.
Northwest of the Junkyard Supply Camp, before you get on the path to the northwest and then northeast, there's a small dead end to the east.
Follow the path to the top to a load of crates and building materials. This dead body is on the other side of them.
Hit the button near Albert's body, and then shoot the targets in the same order they appear to unlock where they came from. Down there is Aaron's body (and a passcode for Xion: aSaSaS).
Southeast of the Junkyard Supply Camp is a chest, near a drone. Code to get in is 0nrrrS.
At the bottom of the water in the middle of the Plant.
Once you pick up the “Incarceration” side quest from the guy in the shipping container, you'll find another corpse in the water. This one with this memorystick.
Above the red lights in the middle of the water, on that platform.
Push all three storage trolleys on the pressure plates and this will drop from the crane.
In the south east corner of the area just before you take the elevator down towards Altess Levoire.
To the left of the lift (slightly west of the Eastern Great Canyon Legion Camp).
To the right of the lift that leads down towards the main mission objective.
Head southwest from the bottom of the lift to the gate. The human body with with memorystick is there.

title: Document - Prayers - Chapter of Trial 6 - S

description.content: From the elevator, heading northwest, before the path goes directly west, on the right (east) is a dead end. In that southern wall is a small cave with a shrine in it.
As the path bends west, go east and destroy the crates. There's a corpse with a Body Core hidden by said crates.
Directly before the entrance to Altess Levoire.

East of the entrance to Altess Levoire is a gate. Go through it towards the other gate, and then turn north and climb the cliffs to the top. Then, head south and jump over the gap to another set of rocks. There's a chest up there. Inside is an Omnibolt and Fixed Damage Gear (2 star).
Drop down a level and head east to the end where you will see a newspaper dispenser. Interact with it for this document. There's also a Drone Upgrade Module beside it.
From there, head back west and traverse the cliff on the southwest side. Before you cross the bridge there's a Nano Suit box there, on the right.
Cross the bridge and drop into the courtyard down below.
Solve the pressure plate puzzle in the same area, by putting all 3 carts on the left-hand pressure plate (so it reads 23 on the left and 3 on the right).

Head down the rope into the large pit in the southeast Scrap Plains and into a cell-like door on the western side of the structure. Probably about midway up. This is the location of the “Life of the Scavengers” side quest.
Interact with Tommy's body after defeating the Brute.
In a chest where the Brute came from in the Forbidden Area. Directly behind Tommy's body.

Now that you have Double Jump, fast-travel to the Western Great Canyon Supply Camp and head north, and climb the cliffs to the north. Keep running, jumping and climbing until you reach the top. There’s an ice chest with this can in it.
Just to the right of the can is a human body with this Beta Core in it.
Head up further (to the north) and then head west and south across the bridge. There you'll find a lot of enemies and also a crate with this inside.
Northeast of the Barren Land Legion Camp is a wall you can climb (near the waypoint, north facing cliff face).
You'll find this as part of the side quest, “Keeping Secrets” - part of the Su and Enya storyline. North of the Solar Tower.
Also part of the side quest, “Keeping Secrets” - part of the Su and Enya storyline. Northeast of the Solar Tower.
During “Stolen Treasure,” you'll have to head to the Villa in the Scrap Plains (east of the Central Scrap Plains Supply Camp). Upstairs near the bot. Part of the quest.
Northwest of the Junkyard Supply Camp is a wallrunning section that you need to Double Jump for. Head back there and follow the path to the end for this Beta Core.

East-northeast of the Central Scrap Plains Supply Camp (just slightly west of the Waypoint) are some metal platforms. Climb to the top (needs Double Jump) and you'll find the can up there.Use the ramp on the west to get up top.

take the path up to the north from the Solar Tower and bend round to the east, when you drop down (while still heading east), where the Racer's High Nano Suit was, you're actually going to want to drop down to the south, and then platform the way along a few cliffs and up a lot of them too. There's only one way to go, so stick on the path and you'll be at the ladder and the can in no time.
Next to the Central Great Canyon Legion Camp is a billboard. Pull over the yellow crate from the north to the steel girder. Double jump up and walk across the billboard for this can.

title: Nano Suit - La Vie En Rose

description.content: Use the code B0aydS on the ship container to the west of the Western Grand Canyon Supply Camp (part of the “Recruit Passcode Specialists” Request).

images.alt: Nano Suit - La Vie En Rose
Nano Suit - La Vie En Rose
Nano Suit - La Vie En Rose

title: Document - Prayers - Chapter of Salvation 0 - Omega

description.content: In the same container as the previous Nano Suit.

After finishing D1g-g2r's side quests he'll leave to go to Xion. When he does, return to the Wasteland and head to the Scrapyard. On a large computer screen to the east of the entrance (under a box and by a ladder), you'll be able to interact with the screen to grab this collectible.
As you walk down the stairs when Lily says the timelines don't match up. Can't miss this one.
After the wallrunning over the fallen floor section, it's on the floor in front of you.
After fighting your first infector, this will be in the main corridor.
In the control room where you have to open a door (after getting through the timed door), just interact with the computer on the right.
By the door you just opened. Can't miss it.
After the symbol floor puzzle, on the right before you go through the next door.
Through the door, on your left
Up the ladder as you enter, and then head to the right and open the door on your right. Watch out for the 2 Infectors inside.
Follow the walkway to the right until you see a door with a broken red panel. The document is inside, on the left. Careful of ambushes!
When you head back towards the ladder (clockwise), a door that was previously closed is now open. There's a box inside.

title: Robot - Document - Promotions - Eidos Company Promotion

description.content: In the far left room (as if you were facing the way you came in), there's a robot in there now.

images.alt: Robot - Document - Promotions - Eidos Company Promotion

description.content: As you come down the elevator, there's a camp just on the right.
After you beat the ambush and make it up the lift.
Once you've cleared the monster covering the walkway, there's a cache before you move into the next room.
Head past the locked door that needs a keycode, go through the door with the green light next to it, and then there'll be a body on the right down there with a passcode.
Carry on to the end of the corridor until you reach a door. Inside is a dead end, but also a Legion Supply Box.
On the walkway between fans, after doing the fan set-piece. It needs the Hacking Tool, but don't worry if you don't have it, as it's just a lot of Nano Elements.
By the next set of ladders up (d-pad mini-game inbound!).
Up the next ladder, and then do a 180 and hop over the barrier. There you'll find a robot.
Next to both sets of ladders.
As soon as you land on Matrix 11, it's on your left.

title: Document - Announcements - Great Desert Crossing Exploration Team Advertisement

description.content: You'll find this one on the floor by the fast-travel phone booth in the Supply Camp.

images.alt: Document - Announcements - Great Desert Crossing Exploration Team Advertisement

title: Great Desert Memorystick - The Last Theorum of an Unknown

description.content: Before taking the lift down from the landing pad, head right into the toilets and the human corpse is there.

images.alt: Great Desert Memorystick - The Last Theorum of an Unknown
Great Desert Memorystick - The Last Theorum of an Unknown

description.content: Before going up the ladder over the train carriage (which you can actually wander through the doors of too), go into the train carriage. There's a crate down the east end.
When you fight your first two Skullings, there's a box in that corridor (south side).

title: Robot - Document - Announcements - Transport Delay Notice

description.content: Crash through the wooden struts down the stairs and the robot is right ahead.

images.alt: Robot - Document - Announcements - Transport Delay Notice

description.content: West of the next carriage, outside, is another chest.
In the next train track section, on the right. Hard to miss.
After defeating your first Skull Trooper, head to the right and double back to where you come from (opening the shortcut). The chest is there.

After Adam tells you to take the high road. On the left is a blocked door with a yellow sign above it. Approach it and an enemy will crash through. In the room it came out of is a memorystick and a supply box.
Same area, has a Melee Protection Gear (2 star) and an Omnibolt inside of it.
In the next open-ish area, there's a train carriage (after a fight with a handful of enemies) on the south wall. Down the end is a crate with this Nano Suit inside.
When you see the Hive blocking the way, take a left out the door, there's a body with a memory stick just to the right.
Head southwest of the previous memorystick and there's a robot there with a Tumbler Expansion Module inside.
At the end of the train tracks and down the ladder is safety.
Above the Legion Camp (just one level up, above the workbench) - Contains 2 x Drone Upgrade Modules.
In the front of the train carriage that just flew down the tracks and crashed.
In the next corridor, head to the end and take a right. The corpse and passcode are at the end of that small corridor.
On the opposite side of the upper terrace as you reach the landfill area.
Head down the lift and downstairs, where the Mites are, is a body with this memorystick.
On the left-hand side of the actual landfill, up a level from the garbage and the enemies.
In the middle of the landfill area. Passcode is from the body before (ardu0d). Also contains the Fusion Cell.
As you come out of the landfill (after using the Fusion Cell), on the right, on the train tracks.
Head forward from the last memorystick, and then take a left. Destroy the Hive and this human body and the Body Core is behind it.
Head forward from the last memorystick, and then take a left. Destroy the Hive and this human body and the Body Core is behind it.
As soon as you step onto the bridge, there will be a staircase on the right. Go down the stairs and you will find the Legion Supply Box.
Follow the collapsed bridge to the end, and there's a robot in that area with 2 Skull enemies.
Turn around from the robot and climb the stairs to find a supply box. Contains an Omnibolt and Critical Enhancement Gear.
Up top, after the QTE train sequence, on the main road.
At the end of the tunnel upstairs.
In the next broken bridge area, after going through the Hive infested train carriage, on the right-hand side of the next carriage.
In the next area where 3 Skull enemies are.
After observing the view from the bridge, in the next area, inside the carriage on the left, you'll find a Beta Core.
At the end of the platform level, before going down the ladder.
At the bottom of the ladder, under the stairs to the right.
In the next area after going down the ladder, at the end of the corridor down low.
Do a 180 from the last collectible, and look to the southeast.
On the walkway of the area the last two collectibles were in, in the northeast corner.
In the next area, in the northeast corner, behind a Hive monster. It contains an Omnibolt and Speed Increase Gear (2 star).
Above the previous chest, up the stairs, against the wall.
At the end of this area is a Legion Camp which Adam will say you should rest at.
After climbing the carriage up, do a 180 and look behind it.
In the southwest corner of the Rail Yard where you fight the Stalker, on the platform along the edge.
Just up a level to the north from the previous can.
Using N72R5 to open the gate after the Stalker fight will walk you straight into this supply camp.
Just before entering the sewers (after going down some stairs), do a 180 and head east until you hit the dead end. The body with the memorystick is there.
After EVE says “This area…”, head down, and there are a load of dead bodies down there. In the northeast corner there are two together. One will have this memorystick on it.
The other body (mentioned above) will have this passcode on it.
If you head back up and head south-southwest a Skull will crash through the wall. Defeat the enemies and go into the room where the Skull crashed through from.
At the end of the corridor (south) where the previously mentioned Skull came from. Needs the EKaKds passcode. Contains the Fusion Cell.
Behind the aforementioned chest.
After going up the lift and crossing the walkway, this body is straight ahead, next to the floodgate.
Head north and then west into a small room. The chest with this item is inside.

title: Robot - Document - Log Data - To the Little Drone

description.content: Head southwest and into the floodgate control room. Firstly, however, head upstairs and there is a robot above it.

images.alt: Robot - Document - Log Data - To the Little Drone
Robot - Document - Log Data - To the Little Drone

description.content: After opening the floodgates, head towards the objective, but instead of going the correct way, swim down to the south. There's a hole in the roof in that passage where you found the Fusion Cell.
Again, before heading the correct way, while in the central chamber, dive down and head into the northeast corner. When you're in the corner, swim to the surface and there you'll find a Beta Core.
In the right corner of the corridor, after you open the main quest objective door.
Down the bottom of the stairs.
In the first room of the Rotten Labyrinth, up on a walkway to the left (same room as the Hive).
Head down the north tunnel before leaving that first room and there'll be a body in the short tunnel at the end.
In the next curved corridor, that leads into the next room.
In the next room with 2 Cricket Butchers in them. Climb up the ladder to the west as you walk in, and then jump across to the other side. The robot is there.
In the north-northeast corner of the same room. Climb the ladder (where you will eventually put in the Fusion Cell) and then turn around. In that room straight ahead, down the bottom, is a Beta Core.
Opposite the place where you put in the Fusion Cell. Up top. Jump and swing across.
After climbing the elevator shaft and going down the stairs. Look to the north and there's a body in that dead end.
Head down the ladder and take a left at the junction. The robot is up the stairs there.
Follow the corridor west and then on the right will be an offshoot of a corridor (next to a corpse). The chest (with the Fusion Cell) is at the end.
After using the Fusion Cell to open the door, the memorystick is on the body straight ahead, on a mattress.
Head east from the main junction and destroy the two planks (and 3 enemies). The box with this Exospine is straight ahead.
Head back to the main corridor and then head west. Opposite the Fusion Cell locked door, there's a machine there with this journal.
In the room where the survivors were, head left and interact with the bookcase.
Next to the guitar is a locked chest (needs Passcode yBKBdB).
In the southwest corner near the beds.
In the back corner, near the bunk beds, on top of a mattress.
Interact with the notice board near the neon Liquor sign downstairs in the same area.
Same room, head up the ladder and it's smack bang in front of you.
Next to the Legion Camp.

title: Document - Prayers - Chapter of Trial 1- B

description.content: On the actual memorial.

images.alt: Document - Prayers - Chapter of Trial 1- B

description.content: In the memorial room, on the right-hand side. Next to the Fusion Cell.
As you leave, look up to the right of the entrance, there's a chest there with this nano suit design inside.
Head back downstairs and head up the tunnel to the northeast. There's a robot there.
Just up to the left of the first Hive monster.
Destroy the second Hive monster, and take the tunnel that it was covering.
In the same area, just in a different offshoot of a tunnel (southern one).
After sliding down the ramp and ending up in front of the old generator, there's a corpse next to it.
The other side of the lift (use the controls to jump on and jump over the fence). Need the Hacking Tool installed.
At the bottom of the lift.
Northwest corner of the boss fight arena (on the shipping crates, inside a shipping crate).
In the eastern corner, behind a shipping crate. Contains 2 Omnibolts and Burst Enhancement Gear.
In the southwest corner of the boss fight arena.
Next to the aforementioned can.
On the way out of the arena (up on the southern walkway).
As you leave the arena in the southeast corner.
Slide down the lift shaft and there's a crate on a platform at the bottom. It contains an Omnibolt and Shield Destruction Gear (2 star).
In the Train Graveyard, on the south side of the long flooded tunnel, inside a locked container (the right of the two).
Swim through the shipping containers to the north of that carriage above and this is on top of a shipping container.
About midway down, underneath 2 Skull monsters, inside a train carriage underwater, there's a corpse with a passcode.
To the northwest of the previous carriage is a platform above the water. There is a body with a Body Core on top. Use the wooden planks to jump over to it.
If you follow the passage to the north, you can swim under (near the middle to the left). There you'll find this can on the eastern side.
After leaving the flooded tunnel, there's a Legion Camp as you exit.
Underneath the Legion Camp, in a dead end.
After sliding down the shaft full of turbines, do a 180 and head to the east. There's a robot there.
Near the Hive at the top of the staircase, after passing through the tunnel after the sliding set-piece.

title: Supply Camp - Contaminated Water Purification Plant Entrance

description.content: At the top of said stairs, behind the Hive.

images.alt: Supply Camp - Contaminated Water Purification Plant Entrance

description.content: Above the Supply Camp, and beneath the door to the boss fight.
As soon as you land in the Great Desert, this camp is right next to the Tetrapod.
South from the small rocky hill where you begin the “Reboot!!!” side quest. Move the yellow box around until you can jump up to the ledge. The supply camp is there.

Look up to the East while standing up on the supply camp ledge. You will see a small target hovering in the air, shoot it and a rope will drop out of it. Jump and swing across to the other side to find the chest.
Back on the supply camp ledge, look to the South and you will see some ledges you can jump to. Jump across to the ledge and continue around to find the Body Core.
On the ground level directly beneath the previous Body Core.
Southwest of the previous supply box, in the middle of the desert.
South of the previous supply box, on the scaffolding behind a sign.
East of the previous collectible, behind a fence that can be entered by breaking the boxes.
Next to the aforementioned robot.
On the roof of the building. Use the ledges to climb up.
Also on the same roof, near the previous bupply Box.
Southeast from the ruined building, underneath the overpass, between a car and a bus.
North-northwest of the Solar Tower, up on the overpass, above the previous collectible.

title: Document - Series - Notes on EVE Protocol 4

description.content: West of the supply camp, by some rubble.

images.alt: Document - Series - Notes on EVE Protocol 4
Document - Series - Notes on EVE Protocol 4

description.content: To the left of the previous collectible, by the same pile of rubble.
Follow the overpass west until you see a red car by the edge. The sentinel is leaning against the western side of the car.
Just slightly north of the previous memorystick. On the metal walkway of the overpass.

title: Supply Camp - Way to the Solar Tower

description.content: Directly to the east of the Abandoned Overpass supply camp.

images.alt: Supply Camp - Way to the Solar Tower
Supply Camp - Way to the Solar Tower

description.content: To the south-southeast of the Solar Tower, in the corner of the fenced off area, by a floodlight. The passcode is: naEdrr, and it opens Teddy's Locker in Xion.
About halfway up the solar tower.
Around the other side of the solar tower.
Northwest of the solar tower, up on the cliffs overlooking the area. Contains an Omnibolt and Training Gear.
Follow the cliffs to the west until you come across a crate to open. Make sure you have some ammo with you.
East from the previous supply chest in the ruined city area.

title: Legion Camp - South of Buried Ruins

description.content: Northeast of the Solar Tower, in an enclosed area in the ruins (if you're coming from the above document, then destroy the barrel in the southern wall to get access to this area).

images.alt: Legion Camp - South of Buried Ruins
Legion Camp - South of Buried Ruins

description.content: Just slightly north of the South of Buried Ruins Legion Camp.

title: Document - Prayer - Chapter of Trial 3 - a

description.content: Head east out the gate and then head into the building to the north. This collectible is there, in a box on the shrine.

images.alt: Document - Prayer - Chapter of Trial 3 - a
Document - Prayer - Chapter of Trial 3 - a

description.content: South of the previous collectible, in a building, up a floor.
South of the ruins (on the other side of them). Near a downed telegraph pole.
Follow the Collapsed Overpass to the southern tunnel. There's a supply box inside. Need the Hacking Tool to open.

title: Memorystick - Words Spoken: Embracing Death with a Smile

description.content: Head west into the other overpass. Jump over the two swinging poles, and at the bottom is a corpse with this memorystick.

images.alt: Memorystick - Words Spoken: Embracing Death with a Smile
Memorystick - Words Spoken: Embracing Death with a Smile

title: Memorystick - Words Spoken: Finding Peace Before Death

description.content: Head south of the other collectible and you'll find this one, by a locked door.

images.alt: Memorystick - Words Spoken: Finding Peace Before Death
Memorystick - Words Spoken: Finding Peace Before Death

description.content: Continue on up the western overpass to the north, and just as you come back outside, there's a body by a car.
Continue north along the road. Slide down and use the pole to make it over the gap. The crate is there on the left, on the other side.
Continue north, and next to two Old Droids, on the right is this crate.
Use the yellow box in that area to climb the wall. On the other side, to the north, near a car, is a body with a Beta Core.
East-northeast of the Way to the Solar Tower supply camp is a load of boxes and explosives, with a supply crate in the middle.

Head back towards the buried ruins. North of where the Legion Camp is, on the east side is a bus (east of the Waypoint). Stand on the bus and double jump up to the swinging poles, and then onto the rope to get to the roof. The body is up there.
From there head east to the overpass and then head south until you see a bus up top. Shoot the barrels next to it and the bus will drop, allowing you to climb up. The crate is just as you get up.
There's one to the south of the previous collectible but it won't open. Need to have accepted the “Precious Treasure” request to open it.
To the north of the previous collectibles is another Supply Camp.

Southeast of the Debris-Filled Entryway is some quick sand. On the southeast of that (east of the Waypoint north of the Solar Tower) is a cave. Head inside, kill the 2 Lurkers, and then push the yellow crate to the end and climb the wall. The can crate is at the top.
North of the Supply Camp is a human by a Daily Grind billboard.
Just north of the previous memorystick is a supply crate.
From the supply camp, head east into the ruins and there's a body and a Body Core inside one of the western most buildings.
Head east to the far buildings and there's a supply crate down low, towards the east side of the ruins. Contains 2 Omnibolts and Ranged Protection Gear (2 star).

Head southeast of the previous one, onto the roof with the yellow box. Push it south, and climb on it to be able to latch onto the wall opposite it. Climb to the top, and in the northeast corner of the rooftop with a ramp is this crate. Contains 2 Omnibolts and Ranged Enhancement Gear (2 star).
Now take the ramp west and jump from pole to pole until you reach the robot on a roof.
From there, head west, before then jumping up to the roof to the south. The Nano Suit is up there.
Before going north, head west and then north through the rocks. The building straight ahead (to the left) has two Turret Droids in it. The memorystick is under them.

title: Legion Camp - West of Buried Ruins

description.content: Head north, along the outer wall, to unlock the West of Buried Ruins Legion Camp.

images.alt: Legion Camp - West of Buried Ruins
Legion Camp - West of Buried Ruins

description.content: West of the legion camp is a Road Closed sign in front of a large rock. In the middle will be a glint every so often. Drop a Smart Mine and it'll spawn 2 Creepers and a Lurker (as well as this can chest). Kill the enemies, grab the can.
In the next area to the right, in the northeast corner, is a supply chest.
South of the previous collectible is a enclosed area, which is where you need to go for the “A Treasure with a Name” side quest. This is the 1st of 3 memorysticks to collect.
Also part of the “A Treasure with a Name” side quest. This is the 2nd of 3 memorysticks to collect.
Also part of the “A Treasure with a Name” side quest. This is the 3rd of 3 memorysticks to collect.
From the Legion Camp, go forward under the green light, and to the right is a bot with this document on it.
Just slightly north of the previous bot is a human, near a knee high wall.
Southeast of the memorystick, on the main road from the south, is a robot behind a bus.
Further south, near an Old Droid and a couple of Droid Turrets.
Back to where you found Citizen 360's Complaint. Head west to get into a warehouse where this chest is.
In the northeastern part of the ruins, there's a bus and a ladder leading to the roofs. Head up. On the first roof you jump to, there's a supply chest there.
On the next roof, the one with the big yellow box to move.
On the next roof, where you have to wall jump, do a 180 and you'll see a can crate behind some lasers. Jump and dodge to get through them to get this can.

title: Memorystick - Yo's Mutterings, Ryu's Rage, So's Resolution, Lune's Last Words, Mel's Faith and Raan's Testament

description.content: Defeat Abaddon on the roof during the side quest, “An Eye for an Eye, a Tooth for a Tooth” and it'll drop 6 memorysticks.

images.alt: Memorystick - Yo's Mutterings, Ryu's Rage, So's Resolution, Lune's Last Words, Mel's Faith and Raan's Testament
Memorystick - Yo's Mutterings, Ryu's Rage, So's Resolution, Lune's Last Words, Mel's Faith and Raan's Testament
Memorystick - Yo's Mutterings, Ryu's Rage, So's Resolution, Lune's Last Words, Mel's Faith and Raan's Testament

description.content: From the rooftop, head east-northeast for this supply samp. On the adjacent rooftop.
On the rooftop to the north of the supply camp.
Drop down to the east, and then in the southeast corner of the next area you'll see a Fiz machine with this can.
Behind the Fiz machine, on the other side of the wall.
Head west and into the building underneath the Supply Camp. Requires a passcode, which you'll find in the Opera House. Contains 3 Omnibolts.
Now head east to the dome shaped building. There's a supply box on the western side.
Just to the northeast of the supply box is a newspaper dispenser with this newspaper in.
Downstairs in the Opera House (the dome shaped building) is a robot with this passcode.
Northeast corner of the Opera House, near a bus.

To get this one, you need to solve a door puzzle to the north of the Opera House. Take out the turret and then put the hover storage on the pressure plates, so that they all equal 4, 6 and 7 (from west to east). Once you've done that and got all greens, open the door to the northeast. Inside is a can chest.
Same garage is a supply crate. Contains Gold Gear (3 star) and an Omnibolt.
Northeast of the puzzle area, on the road out of the ruins.
East of the previous pressure plate puzzle is another one. This time put the yellow boxes on 12, 2 and 13. Once you do, the can pops out the chest at the south end of the area.
At the end of the northeastern street is a body with a Body Core on it.

title: Legion Camp - Middle Path Between Ruins

description.content: Head south-southeast from the Opera House and then take the street east. The Legion Camp is midway down that street.

images.alt: Legion Camp - Middle Path Between Ruins
Legion Camp - Middle Path Between Ruins

description.content: Head northeast from the camp and push the yellow block all the way to the north to block the lasers. The can is behind the lasers.
South of the Opera House, jump into the building near the explosive crates. The supply box is straight ahead. Can only be opened with the Hacking Tool (which you should have by now).

From inside the same area, head to the right and over the wall. Push the yellow block all the way around to reach the yellow ledge at the other end of the room. Then jump up, go to the left and drop down.
In the same area as the can above.
South of the previous collectibles are some lasers hiding another chest. The middle sensors are on a timer. When they're off, jump through them to get this supply box.
Northwest from the previous supply box and slightly southwest of the Crumbling Rooftop supply camp is a body with a Beta Core.

title: Legion Camp - North of Buried Ruins

description.content: North from the previous beta core and slightly northwest from the Crumbling Rooftop supply camp is the North of Buried Ruins legion camp.

images.alt: Legion Camp - North of Buried Ruins
Legion Camp - North of Buried Ruins

description.content: North-northeast of the North of Buried Ruins legion camp.

Heading Northwest along the outskirts of the Buried Ruins, roughly west of the North of Buried Ruins Legion Camp, is a building you can enter with this crate inside. Contains 2 Omnibolts and Combo Attack Enhancement Gear (2 star).
Southwest of the Buried Ruins, at the base of one of the pillars of the large highway overhead.
West of the previous collectible. Move the yellow box to pillar with the bars, then jump up and across. The supply box is at the top.
Next to the rock formation beside the waypoint.
Slightly west is a rock formation. On the eastern side is a body with this memorystick.
Inside the same rock formation is a supply box. Use an Explosive Round to destroy the wood blocking the way in.
South of the previous supply box, in the rocks, near the cliff face.
A little further northwest from the memorystick, in a ditch, is a crate sticking out of the sand. Shoot it for this can.
West of the previous can, in some rocks.
On the road to Xion, in the far southwest of the Great Desert.
Directly north of the path to Xion (west-northwest from the Central Great Desert Supply Camp).
Slightly east from the previous supply box, outside a rock formation.
Inside the aforementioned rock structure.
Next to the previous memorystick.
Northwest of the rock formation with the previous collectibles, climb the wall and platform on the drones until you can reach the platform with the ice camp cooler.

title: Memorystick - Galaxy Alan's Lament / Passcode - yyyya0

description.content: From the previous can, just forward and to the west. There's a door you can open there. The corpse is inside with the memorystick and passcode.
On the other side of the same room where you just got the previous memorystick and passcode from.
Northeast of the previous collectibles. Slightly south-southeast from the Tetrapod.
At the top of the building next to the Legion Camp.
Next to the aforementioned corpse is a bookcase with this book, as part of the “Let There Be Light Again” side quest.
West-northwest of the previous Legion Camp, near a bridge protruding out of the sand.

Head north from the previous supply box and go around the back of the rock feature. Climb up on the north-facing wall, look up and shoot a target to the northeast, and then use the swinging poles and rope to get up to the top where the ice camp cooler is.
Head south from the can, and drop down to the southeast. There's a body with a Beta Core there.
North of the Tetrapod are two rock features. On the westside of the most northerly one is this crate.

West-northwest of the previous supply box are old ruins of a building. At the top is this memorystick. You can climb up using the interior of the building, and double jump and dash from the opposite corner to get there.
West of the Tetrapod, on the east side of the large tubes (the Hypertubes).
Slightly northeast of the Legion Camp is a platform with two Turret Droids on it. The crate with this Exospine is in, is on there
North of the Legion Camp, near the Hypertube entrance is a shipping crate with a body on it.
Next to the corpse that had the aforementioned memorystick. Appears to contain a code: u0ydByKaySSynSyrBy (all y's are upside down).

title: Document - Journal - Orca Aerospace Company Hypertube System

description.content: As part of “The King of the Tunnel” side quest, after jumping into the Hyperspace tunnel, you'll end up on the other side of the map. When in the water, dive down to the bottom to find a body with this document.

images.alt: Document - Journal - Orca Aerospace Company Hypertube System
Document - Journal - Orca Aerospace Company Hypertube System
Document - Journal - Orca Aerospace Company Hypertube System
Document - Journal - Orca Aerospace Company Hypertube System

description.content: Still under the water, on the south side, is a crate to open (it has the quest Fusion Cell inside, as well as some goodies). Also has loads of Micro Coils, Micro Motors and Micro Drives too.

title: Document - Prayer - Chapter of Trial 4 - y

description.content: Head south out of the water and climb onto land. There's a shrine at the end with this prayer.

images.alt: Document - Prayer - Chapter of Trial 4 - y
Document - Prayer - Chapter of Trial 4 - y

description.content: Head east up the slope, and you'll come across this body on your way out.
Carry on up the path until you reach the rope at the end. The corpse is there on the right.

As soon as you come out of the secret passage and go through the gate, the camp is there. When outside, find the nearest fast-travel point and return to Hypertube legion camp (via fast-traveling to the Tetrapod).

title: Robot - Document - Series - Plastic Hearts, Vol. 4

description.content: West of the Hypertube legion camp, on the east side of a massive statue, is a robot with this document in.

images.alt: Robot - Document - Series - Plastic Hearts, Vol. 4
Robot - Document - Series - Plastic Hearts, Vol. 4

description.content: On the west side of the statue, up on some scaffolding.
West of the large statue above, is another statue. There's a body there, that has a memorystick as part of the “A United People Cannot be Defeated” side quest.

Behind the statue is a passcode locked chest, that has something to do with the Third Road document (u0ydByKaySSynSyrBy). Passcode is yyyyyy (upside down y's, as that's every third character in the cipher).

title: Document - Messages - Truth of the Cradle / The Truth Under the City of Xion

description.content: As part of the “A United People Cannot be Defeated” side quest, just a bit further north and you'll have to shoot down some crates with these two documents in them.

images.alt: Document - Messages - Truth of the Cradle / The Truth Under the City of Xion
Document - Messages - Truth of the Cradle / The Truth Under the City of Xion

description.content: Northwest of the Hypertube Legion Camp is a pod. Next to it is a document. As part of “Let There Be Light Again” side quest.
North-northwest from the Hypertube Legion Camp is this Supply Camp. Just to the south of the large ship.
Just to the northwest of the camp, by the rocks.
East of the Great Desert Outskirts Supply Camp is a medium-sized statue with pillars sticking out the ground. The two corpses by the central statue have memorysticks on them.
On the other side of the statue.
North of the ship, by a tree, pretty much out of the map, you'll find a body with this memorystick.
East-northeast of the Great Desert Outskirts Supply is an Ice Camp cooler. Interact with it, shoot the 3 targets, and then pick up the can.
East-southeast from the ship is a large statue. There's a robot next to it.
East-northeast from the robot are some ruins. Next to the yellow box is a human body with this memorystick.

Free the yellow box by exploding the barrels, then use it to climb up the north wall, before heading out the back and scaling around the outside of the building to get to the top. When up there use the poles to get across to the Nano Suit crate.
East of the building where the last two collectibles were.

title: Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Pioneers Developing the Green Land!

description.content: ast of the Supply Camp, midway up the remains of a building - use the rocks around the edge to get up to this level.

images.alt: Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Pioneers Developing the Green Land!
Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Pioneers Developing the Green Land!
Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Pioneers Developing the Green Land!
Document - Promotions - Ark-Tech Pioneers Developing the Green Land!

description.content: Up top in the same building is this locked supply chest. Beat the mini-game to gain access.
Just  to the west of the Abyss Levoire.
Northeast of the Abyss Levoire (up the hill, near some crates and barrels).
East of the previous memorysticks are a load of dilapidated buildings. This is one floor up in one of the western ones.
East of the previous one, inside another set of ruinous buildings. In the centre of this small collection of buildings.
The northeastern most building, just at the base of it, outside.

South of the aforementioned memorystick, on the roof, is an Ice Camp cooler. Interact with it and shoot the explosive barrels before they hit you to unlock this one. Make sure you have plenty of ammo!
Just to the north of the Buried Ruins Outskirt Supply Camp is a robot. Kill it for this passcode.

North of the aforementioned Supply Camp. Shoot the target to the north to drop a rope. Then head northeast to the crates at the end. You then want to swing from rope to rope, until you get dropped onto the chest. The passcode is yBLLda.
On the northern shore of the Oasis pond.
Just west of the Oasis Supply Camp, underwater, is a locked supply crate Contains the Cybernetic Bondage Nano Suit Design Pattern. Passcode to get in is: yyyya0
Northwest of the Oasis Supply Camp, next to some boxes on the ridge of a hill.
In the southwest corner of the Oasis.
South of the Oasis, near a platform with a cable running to it, is a Fiz machine with this can in.
Just slightly south of the aforementioned can.
Southwest corner of the Oasis (on the southwest side of the outer wall).
Northeast of the Oasis, on top of the Hypertube. Part of the “Let There Be Light Again” side quest.
This is dropped by the same person you got the previous memorystick off.
Follow the Hypertube all the way east and you'll find the cooler at the end.
East of the Oasis, before the Buried Ruins, next to a sign sticking out of the sand.

Just northeast of West of Buried Ruins Legion Camp is a mini-game of sorts. Firstly, you need to shoot a floating target to drop a rope. Second, you need to climb up and power the generator. Thirdly, you need to race to the second and third before the time expires. Do that, and you'll open the garage door below where you end up, which has a can inside.
On the rooftop where you hit the final switch for the previous can mini-game.
As you enter through the first door, you'll come across the first supply camp.
At the end of the saw blade section.
Once the saw blades have stopped and the fans are off, there is a document near the yellow cube on the left hand side of the room, opposite the legion camp

Instead of heading to the right and going to the yellow box, there's an offshoot in the right-hand corridor to the right. Head in there, defeat all the enemies, while avoiding all the lasers, and this Nano Suit is all yours.
In the room with both control booths, the one in the right-hand corner has a PC on in the corner. Interact with it for this document.
Once you enter the Capsule Cluster Room, you'll see the crate on one of the platforms to the left. You can jump across the floating platforms to get over to it.
Directly after you leave the Capsule Cluster Room.
After unlocking the next gate from the previous camp, there will be another camp at the top of the stairs.
From the previous camp, go into the next room and jump into the control room through the window. The document is on the floor near the blocked stairs.
In the room directly after the long hallway where you have to fight waves of enemies

After turning off the lasers, go across to the other side of the room and before going through the door, climb up the elevator shaft on the right. There will be a crate at the top where you'll need to do another arrow direction puzzle to open it.
Once you enter the overgrown hallway, keep going forward and then there will be a crate on the left end of the hallway.
On the opposite side from the supply box, through the door.

Go through the platforming section until you get to the spot where you have to jump to a ladder. There will be a small room to the left of the ladder you can jump into where the chest will be, being guarded by a Barnacle.
After climbing up the ladder and jumping over to the next platform, there will be a robot that will drop the Tumbler Expansion Module on the next platform directly across from you.
After swinging over the gap with the rope and making your way up a sloped walkway, there's a supply box in there with a couple of enemies.
On top of the tall box to the right of the previous supply box
