From the previous collectibles, go up the rope and then turn around. There will be a crate on a narrow platform you can drop down too.

From the previous supply box, go across the wall running section and jump across the swing bars to the rope. You'll be able to then swing to the left onto another platform with a crate that has a directional puzzle to open.
After sliding down the ladder with the blue lights, there will be a crate right beside you once you reach the bottom.
From the previous collectible, drop down to the walkway below you and instantly turn around. There will a crate at the end of the walkway.
After making your way through the Laboratory Ruins, there will be a document to the left of the door in the red hallway that leads to the room with the camp.
After crossing the large room, on the right before the boss fight.
As soon as you land on Eidos 9, there will be a chest behind the Tetrapod. You'll need to do a sound puzzle to open it.
Once you jump onto the highway, the corpse with the memory stick will be leaning against one of the cars on the right side.
After destroying the first Cocoon, go through the door and there will be a supply box at the end of the hallway.
Jump over to the next roof and go through the door. Go to the right to find another supply box.
From the crate, go the other way and there will be a corpse with the memory stick by the hole in the wall.

From the second Cocoon, drop down the yellow ledges and you'll be able to jump over to an island-like area where there will be a Drone Upgrade Module on top of a car. From there, jump across to the building with the pillars. You'll have to swim through the water for a little bit which will slowly kill you, but you'll make it there before you die. Once you're across, climb up to the top from the yellow ledges on the side. Once you're on the roof, jump up to the top and go through the door. The crate will be to the left once you're inside. (If you pre-ordered the game, and already got the nano suit out of the pre-order crate, you'll only get Vitcoins out of this crate instead).
Head to the building to the south and into the southeast corner to find more supplies.
Before you head to the objective, where you have to run up the sign, don't. Instead go southwest and jump across the containers in the ocean until you reach the end.

title: Robot - Document - Promotions - Eidos 9, Of You and Mother

description.content: There's also a robot here that drops a document.

images.alt: Robot - Document - Promotions - Eidos 9, Of You and Mother

description.content: After killing the first 3 Cocoons, and on your way to the objective, just after Adam tells you there's 6 more, there's a camp on the left.
After fighting the Dozer on the highway to the north of the Camp, there's a chest behind the car on the left.
From the previous crate, go across to the other rooftop with the Cocoon and then climb onto the roof to the right. The corpse with the memory stick will be on the right side.
On the same rooftop, next to the previous memorystick.
Backtrack to the monorail then jump over to the first building you can to the right. Go into the building through the open door and there will be a supply box inside.
Jump over to the parking garage building and there will be a supply box behind the giant AC unit behind the stairs.
From the previous supply box, go downstairs and the camp is at the bottom of the second flight of stairs.
From the previous camp, go downstairs again and enter the parking garage. The corpse with the memory stick will be directly ahead, against the pillar.
To the left behind the yellow car in the southern corner.
Go up a floor in the parking garage and once you reach the fork in the road, go to the left and there will be a crate at the dead end.

Once you have to exit the parking garage by the yellow ledges, following the yellow ledges to the right and you'll drop down into a lower part on the first floor of the parking garage with the supply box.
There's also a memorystick next to the previous supply box.
Once you reach the third floor of the parking garage, there will be a crate beside the Hydra enemy.
Once at the top of the parking garage, this memorystick will be beside the school bus right by the ramp.
Behind the barricade the legionnaire is leaning against is another supply box.

To the south are some tracks. Get on them, head west to the end of the parking garge and then look north. Jump onto the platform around the edge and then make your way down to the surface. The Nano Suit crate is down there.
Jump across to the building south of the parking garage where another Cocoon is located. There will be a flight of stairs behind the Cocoon that will lead to a corpse with the memorystick.
Proceed onto the tracks and head southwest. When you see the white rollercoaster track, go up instead of moving toward the Cocoon to reach this supply box.
Backtrack onto the monorail and follow it until it branches paths. Follow the left path, which should lead you to a giant red slide, then go down it. There will be a camp at the bottom of the slide.
After the ambush is defeated, there will be a crate inside the small building to the right.

From the previous crate, go behind the building and climb on top. Go across the wall running section and then climb up onto the next rooftop. There will be a crate behind the fenced area once you're up top.
From the previous crate, drop down to the street level and there will be a crate in the corner.
From the previous crate, climb back up and follow the pathway and you'll have to climb up some vents. Once you're done climbing the vents, the document will be on the ground ahead.
From the previous collectible, climb the ladder and the chest will be on the left after walking through the fence. The chest will be another sound puzzle.
From the previous crate, swing across the ropes and then enter the small building at the end. There will be a crate inside.
From the previous crate, climb up the building and there will be a camp once you're at the top, before climbing up the ladder.
On the south side of the boss arena, contains Omnibolts and 3 star Combat Continuation Gear.
After making it back to the original monorail, go down the grey slide to where a Cocoon is. There will be a crate beside the button that lowers the rope to get off the island.
Head back to the parking garage roof and head northeast this time. Defeat the Cocoon and head east down the stairs. Under said stairs is another crate.
Up the ladder from the final Cocoon. Before taking the second ladder to the top, there's a camp on your left.
After clearing all 6 Cocoons, you'll need to follow the objective down a red slide. There will be a Dozer and a Hydra at the end. After they're defeated, climb up the small roof, where the crate is.

After going down the red slide and reaching the floating cargo containers, right before jumping onto the main island, you can jump to the half-submerged cargo container. You'll land in the water and have to swim a little bit to the cargo container, but you shouldn't die depending on how far you managed to jump. From here, jump towards the smaller island, where there will be a crate behind the rubble.
Once you reach the Atelier, the camp will be on the pathway around to the entrance.

title: Document - Messages - What Will You Choose

description.content: On the ground inside the Atelier.
By the Tetrapod at the start of the level.
Inside the cave once you dive underwater, there will be a corpse with the memory stick.
In the next area, near the dam, next to some Houndborgs.
Head through the door underneath the waterwall. Also contains the passcode: L0rnKy.
Climb the pillar in the northeast and in the pipe you'll find this drone pack.
Up the ladders in the far corner, leading up to the water controls.
Once you've made it through the door into the facility, when the corridor forks, the left one has this memorystick in it.
There's also a crate to shoot down above it.
At the end of the corridor, before going up the stairs to the Body Core (the next collectible).
Now go up the stairs and there's a human at the end of the path with this core. In some shallow water.
On the correct route, just down the rocks from where the actual route is taking you.
Once you reach the section where the floor stars falling, go through the door on the left and the crate is inside.
AAfter jumping across the sections of the floor that area falling, there will be a corpse with the memory stick right by the stairs. .
At the top of the stairs, before you enter the hypertube.
Straight ahead when you enter the room, if you jump out and to the right, around the wall, you can grab this now.
Head back, and in the northeast corner, near a droid, is a suppl box. Contains Omnibolt and Melee Protection Gear (3 star).
Go down the ladder near to where the Beta Core is, and there's a cache opposite it.
Down below, to the left of the second power machine.
South-southeast from the generator. Behind the fence. In the main downstairs area.
Directly south is a robot, hiding super close by.
Up the stairs, on the way to the final generator.
After the brief boss fight and hypertube section, head into the southeast corner and there's a supply box there.
Next to the staircase that leads up to the way out.

title: Supply Camp - Space Logistics Complex Entrance

description.content: Next to the door on the way out of the area.

images.alt: Supply Camp - Space Logistics Complex Entrance

description.content: Behind the Supply Camp (east side).
Upstairs in the southeast corner of the large warehouse (before leaving through the door out of the area), after the brief boss figh with Belial.
When you finally leave the area, this corpse is in the airlock of sorts.
In the northwest corner of the next area. Contains an Omnibolt and Beta Recovery Gear (3 star)
There's another one in the northeast corner.
Put the 4 balls in their respective holes in the first open area and this will literally drop out of the sky. Well, the container it's in will.
After the chase sequence, directly ahead of you.
South from the dead body, up a ladder on the west side
After getting past the first set of lasers.

After the first main conveyor belt, where you have to go right and the boxes are coming down on a slope, head up that slope and follow it to the end. There's a supply box with an Omnibolt and Burst Charge Gear (3 star) inside.
At the top of the fast moving conveyor belt that goes up, jump up and to the right for this chest. Only crafting supplies, so if you don't want to risk it, you're not missing much.
After you drop down, before moving through the next set of lasers, do a 180, there's a Body Core there under the conveyor belt ramp.
After finishing the conveyor belt section, this camp is straight ahead.
East of the Supply Camp, behind a crate. Perhaps the easiest to find out of all of them so far.
Where the ropes are, drop down and deal with the enemies. This memorystick is on the body in the corner.
After swinging on the ropes, while the way out is up, look right and jump across for this crate. Needs the Hacking Tool.
Turn east from the supply box and climb onto the shipping crates. This cache is round the back.
Opposite the ladder you need to get out is a crate. Use the moving crates to get across to it.
Through the big door and down the rope. On your left.
As you come back around the cars (after doing a U-turn of sorts), there's a supply box in the corner, behind some security barricades. Just contains some crafting supplies.
This one is on the main route, just under the turrets, before the entrace to the Raphael Space Centre.
As soon as you get out of the turret fire, while crossing the plaza, this one is in the door.
At the end of the corridor in the building.

title: Robot - Document - Promotions - Orca Aerospace Company Promotion

description.content: Just to the north of the Legion Camp, before you go through the door into the next area.

images.alt: Robot - Document - Promotions - Orca Aerospace Company Promotion

description.content: In the next room, on the left, by a barricade.
Next to the previous memorystick.
Further north of the other two, nearer the far wall.
Southeast from the other one, leaning up against the Information Kiosk.
Head further east from the previous one and this one is slumped against some seats.
The other side of the seats, behind him.

title: Document - Promotions - Welcome to the Raphael Space Centre!

description.content: Actually in the information kiosk in the middle of the area.

images.alt: Document - Promotions - Welcome to the Raphael Space Centre!

description.content: This body is in the southwest corner of the foyer. Same area.
In Gate 2 (after using the passcode), this body is found near the contaminated crates in the middle.
In the door on your right as you head to the other door on the other side of the foyer. Careful, it's guarded by a Heavy Droid who has 4 Aid Drones as wingmen.
In the east corner (next to where you need to go) is a laser puzzle room. Approach the box, and then dodge the lasers and make your way to the control panel on the eastern wall.
On the right as you walk into the next room, hiding in all the contaminated materials.
On the left as you walk in through the main door (north).
Just next to the aforementioned body.
North from the last pair of bodies, slumped in the corner of the room.
Now head east from that body to the far wall. There's a crate there.
You'll find this one slumped up against the south wall of the same room.

title: Supply Camp - Raphael Space Centre Lobby

description.content: In the east corner of the same room.

images.alt: Supply Camp - Raphael Space Centre Lobby

description.content: Opposite the cargo elevator.
After you get out the lift, it's straight ahead of you.
On the left as you enter the lift.
Push the yellow crate up to the blue crate near it and climb to the top. Follow it northwest to this robot
In the southwest corner, on the ground level.
From the supply box turn around and go in that hole in the side of the storage. Move one of the yellow crates on the right so you can get through the hole in the wall, where the Legion is.
In the northwest corner, under the stairs, push the yellow box forward so you can climb over.
Go out through the door at the top, take a left, and go to the top of the stairs. Instead of going left, go down the lift. The body is under the stairs.
Climb the elevator shaft to the top and go all the way to the northeast and drop down. The glasses are inside that box.
Go back up the lift and carry on to the objective. This one is right in the next room off the previous corridor.
Head through the first Machine Hive and then head northeast through the next one. The body is behind the second one.
Head further in and you'll come across the body with this memorystick.
Go round the corner, start a fight on the 2 Lumps, and another will join in behind you., there's another body under the staircase.
Return to where that third Lump came from and you'll find this memorystick.
Head southeast and round the corner to the right. The chest is there.

Head up the stairs in the previous room and jump onto the containers. Then, go through the gaps in the southwest wall and head to the far south for this chest. Contains Omnibolt and Burst Enhancement Gear.
Once you reach the Maintenance Sector, you can reach the camp by going across the beams on the right end of the room.
From the camp, go across the wall running section and follow the swing bars to the next floor. The crate will be to your right once you're on the next floor.

Once you're outside going across the beams, jump across to another beam and follow it to the end. Once you're at the end, climb up the yellow ledges to find a robot that will drop the Drone Upgrade Module.
Once you're back inside the building, drop down and there will be a crate underneath you.

From the previous crate, after defeating the Machine Hive, you can jump around the wall to the right and there will be a vending machine at the end with the can inside. If you miss this one, you can fish it up from the Oasis in the Great Desert using Strange Bait after finishing Spire 4
Once you enter the Passenger Elevator, the camp will be directly to your left.
Straight ahead, behind Arisa.
After lifting the Code Red and going up to the second floor of the Passenger Elevator, there will be a crate on the right side.
After going up the rope leading to the 4th floor, it'll be on a corpse near the bed.
After reaching the lounge-like area, there will be a crate by the couches.
Automatically activated during a cutscene after going through the door in the lounge.
After leaving the boss fight arena, this crate is in the next room, straight ahead of you.
There's a supply box beside the crate with the Nano Suit.
Inside the elevator shaft, take the first moving yellow ledge and jump off to the right to find the crate. Contains 2 Omnibolts and Risk Taking Gear (3 star)
After taking the third moving yellow ledge, the next crate will be on the left side.
As soon as you reach the top of the elevator shaft, instantly turn to the left to find a corpse with the Beta Core.
There's a supply camp on the right side of the same room as the Beta Core.
When back on earth, going to fight the Elder Naytiba, this camp is on the left after you see the message from Raven.
In the nest on the right.
